serverMessages.title: We're back!
serverMessages.body:
The backend for GopherMaps has been brought back online, and our transition from Google Cloud Run to Amazon EC2 is now complete. 
 
 Since we have moved from a serverless architecture to a persistent virtual machine, the 'cold start' delays that occurred when the app's servers were contacted for the first time after a period of inactivity will no longer occur. 
 
 **TL;DR: The app should feel a bit more responsive now!**
